data.eml:eml: Two new species of the Crematogaster scutellaris group, Crematogaster gordani, sp. nov. and C. montenigrinus sp. nov. (Insecta: Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Crna Gora (Montenegro) with key of this group from Southern Europe.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karaman, M. (2008): Two new species of the Crematogaster scutellaris group, Crematogaster gordani, sp. nov. and C. montenigrinus sp. nov. (Insecta: Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Crna Gora (Montenegro) with key of this group from Southern Europe. Natura Montenegrina, Podgorica 7: 5-24, URL: http://hdl.handle.net/10199/16669
